userClippingsRoot.name: Email placeholders
userClippingsRoot.content:
The subject is "$[SUBJECT]"
The email is from $[FROM]
The name of the sender is $[FROM_NAME]
The sender email address is $[FROM_EMAIL]
The email is being sent to $[TO]
The email is being sent to these people: $[TO_NAME]
The email is being sent to these addresses: $[TO_EMAIL]
The email is being CC'd to $[CC]
The email is being CC'd to these people: $[CC_NAME]
The email is being CC'd to these addresses: $[CC_EMAIL]

userClippingsRoot.name: Email placeholders - HTML
userClippingsRoot.content:
To: $[TO]
From: $[FROM]
Cc: $[CC]
Subject: $[SUBJECT]
<hr>

The name of the sender is $[FROM_NAME]
The sender email address is $[FROM_EMAIL]
The email is being sent to these people: $[TO_NAME]
The email is being sent to these addresses: $[TO_EMAIL]
The email is being CC'd to these people: $[CC_NAME]
The email is being CC'd to these addresses: $[CC_EMAIL]
